name: saas-multi-vendor-ecommerce
description: Multi-vendor e-commerce platform with automated deployment

scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.github:push: git add . && git commit -m 'Auto deployment update' && git push
scripts.health:check: node -e "const config = require('./deploy.config.js').getConfig(); const url = \`http://${config.server.host}:${config.server.serverPort}${config.healthCheck.endpoint}\`; console.log('Testing:', url); require('child_process').exec(\`curl -f ${url}\`, (e,s,err) => console.log(e ? 'Failed' : 'Success'));"
